Detailed Description

A non-isotropic smoothing filter.

Author:

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.filters.OrientedEllipseFilter.OrientedEllipseFilter ( int  numFilters,
int  a,
int  b 
) 

00023                                                               {
00024         if (a == b){
00025             throw new IllegalArgumentException("For an ellipse, a != b");
00026         }       
00027         filterBank = new ConvolutionFilter[numFilters];
00028         int size = Math.max(a,b) * 2 + 1;
00029         for (int f=0; f < numFilters; ++f){
00030             double[][] coeffs = new double[size][size];
00031             double theta = (f * Math.PI) / numFilters; // 0 to 180
00032             for (int i=0; i < size; ++i) for (int j=0; j < size; ++j){
00033                 double x = i - a;
00034                 double y = j - b;
00035                 double term1 = x*Math.cos(theta) - y*Math.sin(theta);
00036                 term1 = (term1*term1) / (a*a);
00037                 double term2 = x*Math.sin(theta) + y*Math.cos(theta);
00038                 term2 = (term2*term2) / (b*b);
00039                 if ( (term1+term2) <= 1 ){
00040                     coeffs[i][j] = 1;
00041                 } // else zero
00042             }
00043             filterBank[f] = new ConvolutionFilter(coeffs);
00044         }
00045     }

00078         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("oriented");

00081         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.OrientedEllipseFilter.smooth ( LatLonGrid  input,
File  out 
)

Finds the maximum response of all the oriented filters. 

00050                                                         {
00051         LatLonGrid result = filterBank[0].smooth(input);
00052         KmlWriter.debugWrite(result, out, "ellipse0");
00053         for (int f=1; f < filterBank.length; ++f){
00054             LatLonGrid fth = filterBank[f].smooth(input);
00055             KmlWriter.debugWrite(fth, out, "ellipse"+f);
00056             int nrows = fth.getNumLat();
00057             int ncols = fth.getNumLon();
00058             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00059                 int maxval = result.getValue(i,j);
00060                 int fthval = fth.getValue(i,j);
00061                 if (maxval == input.getMissing() ||
00062                     (fthval != input.getMissing() && fthval > maxval) ){
00063                     maxval = fthval;
00064                 }
00065                 result.setValue(i,j, maxval);
00066             }
00067         }
00068         return result;
00069     }
